name: In The Room, Inc.
long_description:
In The Room is a hyper-local geospatial social network for IRL real-time connections in shared spaces. Designed to help you vibe with people literally in the same room, it answers the question, "Who’s here?" by seamlessly connecting you with others nearby. 

Currently focused on dating and expanding to friendships and professional networking, it’s perfect for meeting people wherever they gather—restaurants, bars, clubs, lounges, events, or public spaces like Miami Beach. Go outside, vibe, and connect with others in the places you already love to visit.
one_liner: Real-time connections in shared physical spaces
